sentences.en: Although more concerted action is required, its results bear out the need for the various sectors and stakeholders to work together.
sentences.cn: 尽管需要更多的协调的行动，它的结果证明了需要各部门和利益攸关方联合起来。

sentences.en: But a concerted effort has begun to improve the quality of the urban air.
sentences.cn: 但是各方已经开始共同努力改善城镇空气质量。

sentences.en: But whatever happens, Washington would prefer concerted action with its European allies.
sentences.cn: 但是,不管出现哪一种情况, 华盛顿都宁愿同欧洲盟邦一起协调行动.

sentences.en: Concerted action alone leads to victory.
Disagreements among the twelve EC countries prevented them from taking any concerted action.
sentences.cn: 欧共体12个成员国之间的意见不合导致他们无法采取统一的行动。

sentences.en: He made a concerted effort to win me away from my steady, sweet but boring boyfriend.
sentences.cn: 他费尽心思想把我从我那稳健、温柔但却有些乏味的男朋友身边抢走。

sentences.en: In effect, a stage is to a program what an evolution is to a project -- it is used to manage a concerted effort toward some common end.
sentences.cn: 在工作中，一个阶段就是对一个项目演进的计划——是用来管理一个协调的工作，使其向一些共同的结果发展。

sentences.en: Libraries have made a concerted effort to attract young people.
sentences.cn: 各图书馆同心协力吸引年轻人。

sentences.en: Many problems in environmental engineering have required the concerted efforts of scientists and engineers.
sentences.cn: 不少环境工程问题的解决都需要科学家和工程师们共同努力.

sentences.en: Martin Parry, author of the report, says it's time for concerted action by world leaders.
sentences.cn: 该报道的作者马丁·帕里宣称是世界各国的首脑采取一致行动的时候了。

sentences.en: Political action – real, determined and concerted action – seems again improbable.
sentences.cn: 政治行动——真正决定性的一致行动——似乎再次无法实现了.

sentences.en: The aziridinium ions must all be opened by a concerted process.
sentences.cn: 亚胺基杂环丙烷季铵盐的阳离子,一定是按协同反应的方式开环的.

sentences.en: There has been a concerted campaign against the proposals.
sentences.cn: 人们将采取一致行动反对这些提议.

sentences.en: There is a serious need for concerted studies in this area.
sentences.cn: 在这个领域里迫切需要协作研究.

sentences.en: They all made a concerted effort to improve the situation.
sentences.cn: 他们通力合作改善局势.

sentences.en: This influence is likely to continue indefinitely unless we make a concerted effort to stop it.
sentences.cn: 这种影响可能还会继续,除非我们一致协作来改变这种局面.

sentences.en: This type of ions must all be opened by a concerted process.
sentences.cn: 所有该类离子都一定得按有关程序开环.

sentences.en: We have now learned to make a concerted effort.
sentences.cn: 我们已经学会要同心协力.

words.tran_cn: 音乐会用的；在音乐会上演出的

trans.tran_cn: 联合的，同心协力的，竭力的
trans.tran_en: a concerted effort etc is done by people working together in a carefully planned and very determined way
